result.title: Report on relevant regulations and standards
result.description: Preliminary Report on relevant regulations and standards The new technologies and products that are being developed within WP5 of the INGREEN project will be assessed for their compliance with the relevant regulations and standards Task 61 This will involve a series of evaluations of the food safety and production requirements and identification of the potential risks and hazards These evaluations will establish whether external approvals are required To demonstrate that the products and processes meet the EU food safety and environmental protection requirements technical dossiers will be prepared with input from WP2WP5 They will include a description of the products or processes related documentation eg material specifications intended applications critical parameter andor risk analyses test results and evidence to demonstrate that the products comply with the relevant directives or regulations
